attributes.additional_details: At present the main 6 energy companies, have a stranglehold on the energy industry. As a result, many people, especially the old, are being pushed into fuel poverty. Prices continue to rise, as does energy company profits. Please sign this petition, as the Government needs to do more to keep energy companies regulated, and prices lower. As quoted from the Guardian, "The "big six" stranglehold on the UK energy market means consumers are likely to pay almost £2bn too much on household fuel by the end of the decade"
